mapper.insert: insert into mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr (CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE_ID, ATTR_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK) values (#{contactChlAttrRstrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtContactConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attrValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr (CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE_ID, ATTR_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK) values
(#{item.contactChlAttrRstrId}, #{item.evtContactConfId}, #{item.attrId}, #{item.attrValueId}, #{item.attrValue}, #{item.statusCd}, #{item.createStaff}, #{item.updateStaff}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.statusDate}, #{item.remark})
mapper.update: update mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr set EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{evtContactConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ATTR_ID = #{attrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ATTR_VALUE_ID = #{attrValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ATTR_VALUE = #{attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID = #{contactChlAttrRstrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE_ID, ATTR_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr where CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID = #{contactChlAttrRstrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE_ID, ATTR_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr where EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{evtContactConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE_ID, ATTR_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr

select p1.ATTR_VALUE from mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr p1 LEFT JOIN mkt_cam_chl_conf p2 on p1.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = p2.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID WHERE p2.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} AND (p1.ATTR_ID = 500600010021 OR p1.ATTR_ID = 500600010022)

select p3.LABEL from mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr p1 LEFT JOIN mkt_cam_chl_conf p2 on p1.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = p2.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID LEFT JOIN service_package p3 on p1.ATTR_VALUE = p3.SERVICE_PACKAGE_ID WHERE p2.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} AND p1.ATTR_ID = 500600010024

select p1.CONTACT_CHL_ATTR_RSTR_ID, p1.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, p1.ATTR_ID, p1.ATTR_VALUE_ID, p1.ATTR_VALUE, p1.STATUS_CD, p1.CREATE_STAFF, p1.UPDATE_STAFF, p1.CREATE_DATE, p1.UPDATE_DATE, p1.STATUS_DATE, p1.REMARK from mkt_cam_chl_conf_attr p1 LEFT JOIN mkt_cam_chl_conf p2 on p1.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = p2.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID WHERE p2.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} AND (p1.ATTR_ID = 500600010007)
